de.codecrafters.tableview.toolkit

Class SimpleTableDataAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
      • de.codecrafters.tableview.TableDataAdapter<java.lang.String[]>
        • de.codecrafters.tableview.toolkit.SimpleTableDataAdapter

  • public class SimpleTableDataAdapter
extends TableDataAdapter<java.lang.String[]>
    A simple TableDataAdapter that allows to display 2D-String-Arrays in a TableView.
    Author:
    ISchwarz

      • getCellView

        public View getCellView(int rowIndex,
               int columnIndex,
               ViewGroup parentView)
        Description copied from class: TableDataAdapter
        Method that gives the cell views for the different table cells.
        Specified by:
        getCellView in class TableDataAdapter<java.lang.String[]>
        Parameters:
        rowIndex - The index of the row to return the table cell view.
        columnIndex - The index of the column to return the table cell view.
        parentView - The view to which the returned view will be added.
        Returns:
        The created header view for the given column.
